thread.title: Pure Perfection
thread.title_full: Pure Perfection - Review of Park Hyatt New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NRNYC
title: Pure Perfection
text:
We had the most incredible stay ever.This hotel is modern and luxurious.Service was phenomenal .We booked a standard room and got upgraded to a Park suite.Omg what a gorgeous suite they thought about every little detail and add the top of the line to everything.The pool was great and heated and it was 20f outside and inside the pool area was nice and warm it also have a hot tub and steam room.This hotel is amazing and super family friendly.The staff was extremely nice to my toddler and accommodating.Denise at front desk checked us in and took us to our room.She was fantastic.Can't say enough about this hotel.Location was awesome near central park and walk distance to many great restaurants.Concierge really knows the best restaurants in town.That was my first time at a Park Hyatt hotel and now I am
More a fan of Hyatt hotels than ever.Definitely the best and more completed hotel to stay in the city! Park hyatt NYC you guys rock! Thank you for making our stay a memorable one.Truly amazing!
